main.name: Chee
main.description: Currently working in SEMI Integration where I done everything by searching solution from Google and slaping my keyboard :)
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for online security, and a passion for coding. Born in a small town in Northern BC, I made my move to Victoria where I work as a full stack developer for Instant Domain Search, alongside my many ongoing projects. I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time. Outside of work I am an avid motorcyclist, soccer player and Muay Thai fighter. I love to travel and lead a fairly nomadic lifestyle. I built much of my early portfolio from beaches of Southeast Asia and dream of being able to take my work with me while travelling the world.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology (Hons.) (Security Technology)
education.description: Under the recommendation and Guidance of the Head Coach of the UVIC soccer team, I transferred to the University of Victoria. Here I took my Bachelors of Computer Science with a Software Engineering Specialty and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered my passion for scalable application programming (web and mobile), the security behind computer and application systems, and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms..

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
